headline: Itron Q3 Earnings & Sales Beat Estimates, Decrease Y/Y, Stock Down
summary: ITRI's Q3 earnings beat estimates but fall year over year as portfolio shifts and project timing hit revenue.

headline: Fortive to Present at Baird’s 2025 Global Industrial Conference
summary: EVERETT, Wash., October 31, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that Olumide Soroye, President and Chief Executive Officer, will be presenting at the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on Tuesday, November 11th, 2025 at 4:05 p.m. CT (5:05 p.m. ET). The audio will be simultaneously webcast and will be archived on www.fortive.com.

headline: Fortive (FTV) Margin Contraction Challenges Community Bull Case Despite Valuation Discount
summary: Fortive (FTV) posted a net profit margin of 14.1%, just shy of last year’s 14.4%, signaling a modest narrowing in margins. Earnings and revenue for the company have both declined over the past year, with forecasts pointing to further annual declines of 2.9% in earnings and 8.7% in revenue over the next three years. Although Fortive has remained profitable for the past five years, earnings growth has averaged -3.8% per year in that stretch, underscoring the challenging growth outlook. See our...
